name: Chozetsu Rinjin Berabo Man
summary: Chozetsu Rinjin Berabo Man is a platformer with underwater shoot 'em up stages, but the hero here doesn't just use a gun - instead, his whole body is elastic, so you'll find yourself taking out enemies with extending legs, arms and even neck! Along the way, you'll pick up items from destroyed enemies. With a boss at the end of each level, a hero's work is never done.
